name: Mobile Jazz
tagline: The No.1 Boutique App & Web Development Company
description:
Mobile Jazz is an expert in mobile technology. We specialize on building high quality software ranging from simple mobile apps up to complex systems that depend on a reliable and scalable back-end and database infrastructure.
We are result-driven and have strong values for quality and design. We do not just create software, we create experiences. And most important, we deliver what we promise.
